Update Surveydown Package

Source: R/util.R
sd_update.Rd

This function checks and updates surveydown. It ensures that the package is up-to-date.

Usage

sd_update(force = FALSE)

Arguments

force

Logical; if TRUE, forces an update regardless of current version. Defaults to FALSE.

Value

No return value, called for side effects.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
sd_update()
sd_update(force = TRUE)
} # }

On this page
